DOC.detailed_description: This study adults age 40 55 assess sensitivity Project : EVO Monitor cognitive measurement two short-acting cognitively active pharmacological agent , methylphenidate ( MPH ) triazolam ( TRZ ) . The participant receive placebo , MPH , TRZ randomize order three in-clinic study day . All drug administration cognitive test take place clinic medical staff supervision . During study day clinic , participant use Project : EVO Monitor short digit symbol substitution task ( DSST ) 8 time day . A minimum 48 hour need study day . The investigator plan evaluate 18 participant study .
